item.title: Train for Durango
item.description: Train for Durango is a 1968 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Mario Caiano.

item.title: And the Crows Will Dig Your Grave
item.description: And the Crows Will Dig Your Grave is a 1971 Spanish western film directed by Juan Bosch and starring Craig Hill, Fernando Sancho and Dominique Boschero. It is composed by Bruno Nicolai.

item.title: Between God
item.description: Between God, the Devil and a Winchester is a 1968 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Marino Girolami. The story is based on Treasure island by Robert Louis Stevenson..
